name: Xtext Playground
tagline: Playground for special use cases with Xtext
body:
# Xtext Playground
* testing unicode support in grammar, e.g. umlauts in keywords and identifiers
* [TODO markers in DSL](http://blogs.itemis.de/stundzig/archives/827)
* reference chains, e.g. a.b.c where a is an entity having attribute b typed as entity which itself has an attribute
* importing existing ecore packages and referencing their elements inside the DSL
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
